hypothesis_content.title: Stress Regime Altcoin Correlation Breakdown
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regime transitions (VIX > 30 equivalent in crypto), altcoin correlations to BTC temporarily spike above 0.9, then rapidly mean-revert to pre-stress levels within 3 days, creating pairs trading opportunities between high and low beta altcoins.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During market stress, all crypto assets correlate highly as investors flee to safety. However, this correlation is unsustainable and rapidly mean-reverts as panic subsides, creating predictable divergence patterns between altcoins with different fundamental profiles.
entry_conditions: Average 5-day altcoin-BTC correlation > 0.9 (using basket of top 15 altcoins)
Enter when correlation begins descending from peak: 3-day correlation change turns negative

exit_conditions.take_profit: Correlation returns to within 10% of 30-day pre-stress average

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If correlations remain elevated throughout stress period without mean reversion, or if specific altcoins permanently decouple.
